column4: is there a way to change the grub boot loader, so my windows xp boots first?
You can move windows to the first entry or set the default os flag
sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cat /boot/grub/menu.lst | pastebinit (Provide Pastebin link in channel)  and we can help you better
Let me post my menu.lst as an example
You can also do what legend2440 suggests
np..  let me edit mine to have windows boot first to give you a reference as to how to do it
the other would be to make line 14 default to 4
Always more than one way to skin the cat..
No good ones come to mind
Linux quick start or specifically ubuntu
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Training     but it is kinda basic..
